title: How to add a Facebook Like button to my Fan page tab - Quora

response.answer_text: Steps to add a Facebook Like button to a fan page tab: You can use the fb:comments FBML tag to have like button on a fan page. So in ur fan page, just add a FBML box & add the following code to it, to have only the like button. /* This css will hide the comment box & display only the like button */ 	<style type="text/css">            div.comment_body{            display:none;            }        </style>         <fb:comments xid="my_comments" canpost="true" candelete="false"	returnurl="urltobeliked/">            <fb:title>Title</fb:title>                    </fb:comments> Check this link for more - http://fenildesai.com/how-to-add-a-facebook-like-button-to-your-facebook-fan-page-tab/

Since Facebook is phasing out FBML. You are going to have to add an iFrame application to your fan page. Here is a guide: http://braginteractive.com/how-to-add-facebook-iframe-page/ Once you do that, head over to Facebook developers(http://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/plugins/like/) and create your like button and add the code to your iFrame page.
